document.full_text: a former lawyer for glaxosmithkline has been reindicted for obstructing a probe into the company's marketing practices for a drug after the first indictment was dismissed because of errors by prosecutors, the justice department said on thursday.
document.title: former glaxo lawyer indicted again over drug probe
lines_and_colors: a former lawyer for glaxosmithkline has been reindicted for obstructing a probe into the company's marketing practices for a drug after the first indictment was dismissed because of errors by prosecutors, the justice department said on thursday.
